title: Device
description: An identified device that is an application or browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

typeID.title: Type identifier
typeID.description: An identifier for the device. This may be an identifier from 'DeviceAtlas' or another service that identifies the hardware that is being used.

typeIDService.title: Type identifier service
typeIDService.description: The namespace of the service that is used to identify the device type.

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The name of the organization who owns the design and creation of the device, for example, 'Apple' is the manufacturer of the iPhone.

model.title: Model
model.description: The name of the model for the device. This is the common, human-readable, or marketing name for the device. For example, the 'iPhone 6S' is a particular model of mobile phone.

modelNumber.title: Model number
modelNumber.description: The unique model number designation assigned by the manufacturer for this device. Model numbers are not versions, but unique identifiers that identify a particular model configuration. While the model for a particular phone might be 'iPhone 6S' the model number would be 'A1633', or 'A1634' based on configuration at the time of sale.

screenHeight.title: Screen height
screenHeight.description: The number of vertical pixels of the device's active display in the default orientation.

screenWidth.title: Screen width
screenWidth.description: The number of horizontal pixels of the device's active display in the default orientation.

colorDepth.title: Color depth
colorDepth.description: The number of colors the display is able to represent.

screenOrientation.title: Screen orientation
screenOrientation.description: The current screen orientation such as "portrait" or "landscape".
